actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 201 (a) (1) of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 as amended, 42 U.S.C. 5841 (a) (1).

summary.text: Amends the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to permit the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to waive provisions which require members to be present in order to constitute a quorum for transacting business or a majority for taking action. Requires: (1) such waiver to be in writing by all members of the Commission; and (2) that all members agree to such waiver and are unanimous with respect to approval or disapproval of the proposed action.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 201 (a) (1) of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 as amended, 42 U.S.C. 5841 (a) (1).
